name: National Boundary
description: A border between nations defines sovereignty and creates opportunities for international trade and diplomacy. The political significance makes it a focus for military and diplomatic activity, while the crossing points create opportunities for cultural exchange and espionage.
atmosphere: International frontier marked by customs houses and diplomatic facilities while different flags flutter on either side. Cultural exchange and political negotiations occur at official crossings as guards check papers and collect tariffs. Where sovereign nations meet in peace or conflict.
